thread.section_title: TransferWise Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of transferwise.com
thread.title: Alison

author: Alison
title: Alison
text: Everything happened exactly as TransferWise said it would. At every stage of the process I received an email to say my funds had been sent, my funds had been received by TransferWise and my funds were then on their way to my other bank account. The transfer happened within 48 hours which for how cheap it was I found very quick. I think I saved about $750 vs doing the transfer between my banks. I will use TransferWise for every international transfer I do now!! Banks rip you off!!
